import React from 'react'; import Styles from './Navbar-jss'; const Navbar = () => { const classes = Styles() ; const userMenu = ( <>
  • Hey, {user && user.username} 👋
    {/* Admin Menu */} {user !== null && user.role_id === 1 && ( <> Pending posts {/* Manage Users */}
    )} Your posts Profile
    Sign out
  • Messages
    • ); const guestMenu = ( <>
  • Sign in
    • ); return (
    • Requests
    • Offers
    {/* Check if logged in */}
      {isAuthenticated ? guestMenu :userMenu}
    ) } export default Navbar ;
